name: Marinated Grilled Salmon with Avocado and Stone Fruit Salsa
author: Kikkoman
summary: Great easy recipe that is healthy and refreshing!  Use your favorite stone fruit for this salsa!  Any fish that is good for grilling can be substituted for salmon.
ingredients: 2 cups finely diced stone fruit such as peaches, plums, or apricots
2  ripe avocados, pitted, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch dice
¼ cup finely chopped red onion
1  fresh serrano or jalapeno chile, seeded and finely chopped
2 tablespoons fresh lime juice, or to taste
¾ cup Kikkoman Teriyaki Takumi, Garlic and Green Onion
directions: For salsa, gently toss together all ingredients with salt and pepper to taste
Marinate in Kikkoman Teriyaki Takumi Garlic and Green Onion Sauce for about 45 minutes
Preheat your grill for about 10 to 15 minutes
Pat salmon dry, oil grill with olive oil, and grill about 5-7 minutes on each side until cooked through
Top with Avocado and Stone Fruit Salsa
